Articles.Content:
Hi All,

Does anyone know if there is a way to rotate a part on your ship without to detach it? Sometimes I want to slightly adjust the rotation of a part, but clicking it rips the part and everything attached to it from the ship, and unless you clicked exactly over the attachment node, its position shifts to the cursor location and it must be laboriously moved back to its original position, which can be extremely difficult with some of the fiddlier pieces like angled beams.

Edited June 9, 2013 by giltirn
You can't. You have to detach a part to rotate it.
